Managing Multiple Heroku Repos for the Same App

Feb 17, 2012
1 minute read

Recently I had to manage an app that had the staging and production version on heroku. When pushing you don’t have to worry about which version to push to because each repo has a remote name, (i.e. heroku-staging, heroku-production). When it comes to running app specific things though such as console you have to pass in the app name with this flag –app appname. 

  heroku run script/console --app heroku staging
Crafted with <3 by John Otander (@4lpine).
